questions.correctAnswer: They were completely indifferent to it.
options: They were completely indifferent to it.
They preferred the exotic over the everyday.
They showed no interest in it at all.
They focused exclusively on it, eschewing the exotic.
questions.question: According to the text, which of the following best describes the attitude of many Romantics towards the everyday social world around them?

questions.correctAnswer: The artist is a fiercely independent genius who creates original works of art.
options: The artist is a fiercely independent genius who creates original works of art.
The artist is a passive recipient of external influences.
The artist has no connection to the public.
The artist is a socially and politically disengaged individual.
questions.question: Which of the following best characterizes the Romantic concept of the artist as it was portrayed in the text?
